question: Which spacecraft has become the second in place to reach interstellar space in November- 2019?
explanation: Voyager 2 has entered the interstellar medium (ISM).It is the region of space outside the bubble-shaped boundary produced by wind streaming outward from the Sun. A noted increase in plasma density indicated that the spacecraft has travelled form hot and lower-density plasma characteristic of the solar wind to the cool and higher-density plasma of interstellar space. This makes Voyager 2 the second human-made object to journey out of the Sun’s influence. The first one was the Voyager 1’s 2012.
